title: A RESOLUTION REQUESTING THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT OF LAGUNA, HEADED BY GOVERNOR MARISOL ”SOL” ARAGONES-SAMPELO, AND ITS UNIT CONCERNED TO INTERVENE IN THE REVIEW AND IMMEDIATE RESOLUTION OF ALL ROAD EXCAVATION AND PIPELINING PROJECTS BEING MADE BY LAGUNA AQUATECH (FORMERLY LARC) IN ALL PROVINCIAL ROADS IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF LOS BANOS, LAGUNA.
